description.value:
Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.uZK2BYzPnxUBnDjr]{Tangle Vine}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.K9gI08enGtmih5X1]{Protector Tree} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.s3abwDbTV43pGFFW]{Shillelagh}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J6vNvrUT3b1hx2iA]{Entangling Flora}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CXICME10TkEJxz0P]{Shape Wood}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{One with Plants}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns}
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YWrfKetOqDwVFut7]{Oaken Resilience}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.qvwIwJ9QBihy8R0t]{Speak with Plants}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.KsWhliKfUs3IpW3c]{Wall of Thorns}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.YtBZq49N4Um1cwm7]{Nature's Reprisal}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.zCcfPS4y5SrZzU2x]{Plant Form}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
